result.purpose: This folder contains React components that are used to build the user interface of the application, including navigation, footer, and visual effects.
result.architecture: The folder follows a component-based architecture, where each file represents a reusable UI component that encapsulates its own logic and presentation.

src/components/Footer.js.purpose: Defines a Footer component for a React application that displays copyright information and social media links.
risks: Potential for broken links if social media URLs are incorrect

src/components/Navbar.js.purpose: This file defines a responsive navigation bar component for a web application using React.
side_effects: Adds a scroll event listener to the window

src/components/Particle.js.purpose: This file defines a React component that renders particle effects using the react-tsparticles library.
side_effects: Renders a visual particle effect on the screen

src/components/Pre.js.purpose: Defines a React component that conditionally renders a div based on props.

src/components/ScrollToTop.js.purpose: A React component that scrolls the window to the top when the route changes.
side_effects: Scrolls the window to the top on route change
